blog.name: geekycriticalrolo
blog.title: “Just a disaster who plays Dungeons and Dragons.”
blog.description: "Maybe, but you're warm." Ayy I'm Alx,(Aka Rogue) Him/Her. I'm a Writer, a Gamer, A Hopeless Romantic, and a heavy D&D enthusiast. Some could say I talk about it way too much, but that's okay. Games I like: Persona 4, Persona 5, Resident Evil, Silent Hill,Layers Of Fear, The Last Of Us,Firewatch, Final Fantasy, Kingdom Hearts, The Legend Of Zelda and Mass Effect, to name a few. Tv shows I like: Stranger Things,Killing Eve,GoT, The-X-Files,F.R.I.E.N.D.S, IASIP and B99, but there's A LOT! more. Movies I like: The Dark Crystal, Lord of the rings,The Hobbit an many more. I'm also a Musician, D&D player, Comic reader, Cat lover and a Landscape Artist. (I am matching with Aerlinniell, my lovely Fiancé whom I love and adore with all my heart, and also with my dear friend Eltharii. These two are nerds and I have no idea what I'd do without them.)INFP:3 Triforce of courage. Header by MLeeLunsford:3

tags: imagination why you do this to me
you can reply to this message
read the replies for regular updates
summary: What if, much like Pike trying to contact Scanlan with the earring during Campaign 1, members of the Mighty Nein keep casting...
body:
What if, much like Pike trying to contact Scanlan with the earring during Campaign 1, members of the Mighty Nein keep casting Message/Sending to Molly even though they know he can’t hear?

“Mr. Mollymauk, we are leaving Zadash. Come find us in Nicodranas. We will let you know if we go anywhere else. Travel safe, mein Freund.”

“Hi Molly, it’s Jester. If you’re coming to Nicodranas, we’re staying with my mom at the Lavish Chateau. It’d be really nice if you could–”

“Molly everyone’s really sad without you. Caleb won’t admit it, but he misses you a lot. Come back soon, please. You can reply to this message.”

“Molly we’re going out to sea. I don’t think you’ll be able to follow us. Stay with Jester’s mother. We’ll come back for you, versproche.”

(Updated with the ones I’ve been adding each week in the replies)

“Mollymauk Beau is here telling me to tell you that you’re a…bitch. And an asshole. And many other things I’m not going to say.”

“Molly if you ever come to Darktow and people recognize you it’s not because of Lucien that was me sorry I’ll explain later.”

“Holy shit Molly I wish you could have been here everything was crazy and now we’re banished from Darktow but at least we got to–”
“Sorry. Avantika is dead. Fjord is okay. We’re all okay. Even Sprinkle is okay. We’re going to look for the other eyeball thing. Miss you.”

“Well, our sailor friend absorbed ANOTHER orb today. We, erm, also made a blood pact of sorts but…I will tell you about that later…”

“Molly we’re lost in a weird ball…nether…pocket-dimension…thingy but maybe we’ll find you out here somewhere. You can reply to this message.”

“I don’t know if you knew Yasha’s past, but she told us a lot and now I wish you were here to make her happy.”

“Molly it’s been so long I’m forgetting what you look like. I wish I had drawn you better in my sketchbook. Um, was that twenty–”

(Updated again because feels)

“We’re finally leaving the fucking ocean. Fjord says he’s done for now but I don’t know… And I only got to shoot a cannon ONCE.”

“Molly? Molly verdammt noch mal please tell me you can hear this. I can’t do it anymore. It’s all my fault. I shouldn’t have run. I shouldn’t have been such a fucking coward. I’ve lost everything I worked for. They’re all in danger because of me. I…I haven’t decided what I’m going to do next, but…perhaps I’ll see you soon. I would like that.”

reblog.comment:

blog.name: criticalfic
blog.title: Critical Role fic recs
blog.description: A Critical Role fic rec blog. Submissions/requests/suggestions very welcome as I get this up and running!

tags: the other m9 are there as well but those are the characters with speaking roles
title: huzzah
body:
huzzah by AtlantisRises (1,836 words)

Set post Episode 7 of Campaign 2. Personally, one of my favorite things about Critical Role is the excellent NPCs, all of whom seem to have their own important lives and are unique and interesting. This fic is from the POV of Watchmaster Bryce, as they drink and watch the strange merriment after the Mighty Nein have returned to Alfield. It’s just… one of those moments that fanfic is made for, just at the edge of canon, to fill out the things that get glossed over sometimes.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: lostsometime
blog.title: I Lost Some Time Once...
blog.description: It's always in the last place you look for it.

summary: just made myself really sad thinking about the young woman avantika must have been once between the way she was like “that’s...
body:
just made myself really sad thinking about the young woman avantika must have been once

between the way she was like “that’s cute how dedicated you guys are to not killing people. that won’t last,” and how when they asked how many men she’s killed she was like “i lost track after a while” i’m just.  picturing baby avantika being all full of idealism, thinking she’s like, the protagonist of a YA adventure novel, Special and Chosen to have cool powers and be Important, thinking she can follow her “destiny” and raise this trapped god and be a pirate captain and command the seas to bend to her will, and do it all without murdering her way across the lucidian ocean

and when exactly she realized that she couldn’t. 

and what part, exactly, vandren had in her making that realization

and what part, exactly, vandren had in her making that realization
